sub_title: Lelykundige | Directeur | bestuurder at City Marketing Lelystad
summary:
Free-lance brand consultant, brand manager, marketing executive or some other names people give me. Everything I do effects your brand and will increase your sales.
You can reach me through +316-29010537

Your accelerator; enjoys applying strategic, analytic, organizational, and communication skills to guide the team perform to its highest level. Actively searching for a position within a marketing or brand management department where I can put my talents to use. 

Increasing responsibility in brand management, marketing, sales, and product development roles within FMCG, wholesale and retail organizations. A key contributor in the development of brand identity and brand plans to improve overall market penetration with a focus on the value proposition for customers. Extensive experience in discovering the brands USP’s, marketing and promoting the value proposition in both existing and developing markets. The focus on clear understanding of market analytics, dynamics and the need for collaborative development between intern and extern teams (marketing/sales/development).

Core Competencies:
Brand management.
Marketing (SM/SEO/SEA/CRO).
Process management.
Relationship management.
Business development.
Client/Athelete/Sponsorship management.
Sharp at the commercial level, including customer acquisition.
Strategic and creative experienced.
Mindset of a professional athlete (former cyclist).

Calm, continues to master difficult situations and shall not be put out by it.*
Analytical, strong in judgement and capable of ‘inductively’ reasoning.*
Able to make connections with incomplete information and generate solutions.* 
Able to approach issues from different angles and let go of existing interpretation frameworks and develop alternative, creative and innovative solutions.*
Able to understand and assess written reports and texts.*
Sober and optimistic.*
Immune to stress.*

* Above average compared to the standard group management/professional, SHL Management Competencies.

projects.title: Servex
projects.description:
Servex is een dochteronderneming van NS Poort en beheert alle horeca- en retailformules op en rond de NS stations. Denk daarbij aan AH to go, New York Pizza, Starbuck’s maar ook eigen formules als Smullers, Kiosk en Julia’s. Servex heet tegenwoordig NS stations retailbedrijf.

Na een (inter)nationale bureau-oriëntatie heeft Servex voor de herpositionering van een van haar retailformules gekozen voor de expertise van Ons Hoofdkwartier. “Ons Hoofdkwartier presenteerde een zeer verrassende en onderscheidende strategie waar een goed verdienmodel op berekend kon worden”.

Opdracht: Herontwikkel de bestaande retailformule Shakie’s, een juice bar-concept op de stations van de NS.

Neem voor meer informatie over deze case of andere cases contact met mij op via 06-29010537 of barry@beezbookingsa.nl dan kom ik deze graag in een persoonlijk gesprek toelichten.

contributors.headline: Lelykundige | Directeur | bestuurder at City Marketing Lelystad
Creative Concept & Marketing Director | Art Director Achmea

projects.title: Vision branding
projects.description:
My motto: marketing has everything to do with creativity nowadays. Brands need to have guts. Not necessarily in positioning itself, but in the continuous search for new opportunities that will strengthen the relationship with the consumer. The possibilities are endless. To link these possibilities and make them contribute to the brand values, the brand needs to let go of existing frameworks and asks for creative and alternative solutions. Never fall asleep, but always continue, renewing, and surprise.

I can offer brands creativity and stamina in large quantities. I demand brands to challenge me for surprising ideas and strategies. As a professional athlete I learned to maintain, never give up and suffer to achieve goals. This shaped my character and is something I benefit from in my normal and working life. Because of this I can very well handle setbacks, find new ways and opportunities and continue to fight to achieve short and long term objectives.

contributors.headline: Lelykundige | Directeur | bestuurder at City Marketing Lelystad

projects.title: Vision online
projects.description:
I belief that if a brand has no positive connection with the consumer it ceases to exist. This is my vision on the digital world. The online reputation becomes more and more important. It is what counts and is therefore the key to success. Loyalty comes with dialogue. Success is measured by the content of the dialogue and how the online reputation will be linked to the off- and online sales. By managing the online reputation, not only the conversion will increase but the actual value, in terms of the potential goodwill of the brand also. 

I offer brands strategic creativity for gathering data, making meaningful correlations, analysis and set up (additional) business models on the validated target group or 'fan'.

contributors.headline: Lelykundige | Directeur | bestuurder at City Marketing Lelystad

profile_positions.description:
Free-lance brand consultant, brand manager, marketing executive or some other names people give me. I don't mind. Everything I do effects your brand and will increase your sales.

Where is your brand now? Where should it go in the future? Does it become 'future-proof', and if zo, how does it get there? The answer to these questions do I formulate in a brand strategy. To do so, I use different models including the pyramid of Business planning, SWOT analysis and the confrontation matrix. And highly involved with the execution of the strategy and even the change management if needed. For both small, local companies and large international ventures.
Are you looking for temporary or permanent reinforcement and are you attracted to my brand vision on online vision below, please contact me by +31 29010537 or barry@brandalicious.nl.
profile_positions.title: Free-lance Brand Strategy Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Vanuit het merkdenken voor de klanten van Ons Hoofdkwartier in combinatie met mijn ervaring als topsporter, een model ontwikkeld waarbij topsporters en artiesten als merk worden gezien. 

Dit model behoed topsporters voor het zwarte gat na hun carrière. Bijkomend effect is dat zij (of de zaakwaarnemer/manager) de financiële levensduur en opbrengst 'stretchen'.

volunteer_experiences.role: Member of the Board of the Foundation.
volunteer_experiences.description:
Lucien de Louw, former professional cyclist and former teammate of mine, founded the foundation. 6 Years ago he fell riding his bike and became paralyzed from the waist down. Dutch medics are convinced and keep telling him that he should spend the rest of his life in a wheelchair. Not Lucien. A long search got him at the Swiss doctor Marc Possover who might be able to get him out of the wheelchair using the LION procedure. The problem is: the Dutch insurers do not reimburse this operation.
	- Member of the Board of the Foundation. 
	- Objective short term: collect money to have surgery in Switzerland.
	- Objective long term: start the public debate when Lucien rises from his wheelchair and will be able to walk again.
	- Donate prize money by racing races.
	We got the money, he got the surgery and the first results a hopeful. We continue the foundation to help other people, kids, who are also paralyzed.
